content: make the post of those post stitches to create a unique cable pattern that creates a waves of diamonds that will have you wrapped up in style this stitch pattern uses front post stitches in a 3 row repeat that is suitable for advanced beginners the pattern features a stitch chart photo tutorial and a video tutorial to help you master the position of the cable stitches **materials needed** 585m of any aran/worsted size 4 yarn i used knitcraft everyday aran in shade cream tweed 100% acrylic 100g/195m 5mm crochet hook scissors darning needle **skill level** intermediate - this pattern uses front post stitches adventurous beginners will also be able to complete this pattern using the supporting video/photo tutorials **important** i do not accept returns or refunds please do not copy or claim as your own you may sell physical product versions of these however please credit me as the designer please do not sell the pdf if you have any questions please contact me via the contact option on my page or pop me an email at fiona@cosyrosieuk co uk all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2025
